title: Patch 6.6 is live!

embed.description: Greetings, summoners. Welcome to patch 6.6, the one where we buff Kha'Zix. There's lot of other changes, but this one goes out to all you Bug Catchers out there. Oh, and there's a space dragon if you're into that sort of thing. Maybe you've heard of him. He's kind of a big deal.

body:
6.6 is Live! - We're actively monitoring this thread, so let us know here if you find any weird bugs so we can check it out!

See you on the Rift!

-Mindstar

replies.body: i noticed it said aurelion sol will be released in this patch, instead of the usual "will be released later in the patch" which i was assuming it was immediate release with the patch, was i wrong? if not what time can we expect him to be available

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=WNkBJ3RY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-22T22:13:35.241+0000)
>
> i noticed it said aurelion sol will be released in this patch, instead of the usual "will be released later in the patch" which i was assuming it was immediate release with the patch, was i wrong? if not what time can we expect him to be available


>I was just about to post the exact same question - any idea when Aurelion Sol will actually become available?
in au it was 23/3/16 {{champion:136}}

Anyone having issues purchasing RP since patch? 

I've tried a few things (even repairing patch) and still seems to be a problem {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=D1va,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=WNkBJ3RY,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-03-23T07:24:27.497+0000)
>
> Anyone having issues purchasing RP since patch? 
> 
> I've tried a few things (even repairing patch) and still seems to be a problem {{item:3070}}

Having the same issue on two different accounts

Hmmm that seems to be a problem then, good to know I guess - I'll go buy a prepaid card and see if that works. 

I'm assuming it's either client or possibly server based :\ 

edit: Just tried then and it worked - got the transaction confirmation and all :)

Hey is anyone else getting a "PvP.net FATAL ERROR"? Which says the following :

00002: mod/win/ClientWindow.dat
[IOErrorEvent type="ioError"
bubbles=false cancelable=false
eventPhase=2 text=Error #2032"
errorID=2032]

???
At what point do you see this error?  When you are trying to patch?
Should I just hit Repair already ?
You could try repairing - I'd also suggest checking out the [patching issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) support article, and maybe forcing a re-patch.

Yeah it worked , logged in now. 

Thanks heaps mate!

Thanks, just done that now and League is now updating. I'll Let ya know how i go !

Cheers.
During most games i experience a Firewall error and the game crashes (this has happened so frequently that I've received several Leaver Busters). Does anyone have any tips on how to fix it?
The firewall bug is just a triggered effect when your internet is acting up by the way
So if i fix the problem with the internet itself then the Firewall bug will disappear as well?
basically yes :D
I'm using a toshiba NB 500 almost never has any sort of bugs. lol. It's 5 years old btw and get it from my old school for $1. lol
Im using a Netgear router (i fixed it now but where i am i could expect more issues in the future)
When will the store be going live with Aurelion Sol because these RP are burning a hole in my pocket and I can't yet select him for purchase or play :(
As of 1015 HRS, there is still no Aurelion Sol available in the store.

> [{quoted}](name=Spoooks,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=WNkBJ3RY,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2016-03-22T23:14:59.835+0000)
>
> As of 1015 HRS, there is still no Aurelion Sol available in the store.

Still no Aurelion Sol :(
He's finally available!!!! And we got Hextech Crafting!!! WOOOOO! {{champion:136}}
YAY can't wait for him in a random rotation.

> [{quoted}](name=tweakiller,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=WNkBJ3RY,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-03-22T22:56:10.001+0000)
>
> When will the store be going live with Aurelion Sol because these RP are burning a hole in my pocket and I can't yet select him for purchase or play :(

1 hour without reply on my post, actively monitoring seems to be a myth
Do not EVER repair your client unless a file is corrupt

Hey guys, getting a fatal error every time I try even entering the league client. When I press launch, everything disappears and I get the fatal error. Its the same one that IronLaKEr below me in the discussion has. I have done everything short of uninstalling and am currently waiting the loooong wait for it to finish attempting to "fix itself" through the given option. Doubtful that will work. If anyone has any info, gimme a shout please and thank you. 

-Black
Generally a computer problem due to your computer not compatible to a certain file in the league files

I can't launch the patcher at all. I looked at the NA status page briefly and noticed that users running Avast Anti-Virus are having issues with patching, yet there is nothing on the OCE page, nor the OCE boards. Just wondering if that is the case here as well. Thanks for your time Riot, love your game!
what was the update patch for this morning if it wasnt to release aurelion sol

Woke up and read the patch and saw "Aurelion Sol will be released in this patch". I assumed it he was going to be out as soon as league patched, but he wasn't. When will he actually become available??{{champion:32}}

As with other champ releases, Aurelion Sol will be coming out in the days following the patch.

Cheers
Mindstar
But it said will be released with patch.

> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=WNkBJ3RY,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-03-22T23:18:59.581+0000)
>
> As with other champ releases, Aurelion Sol will be coming out in the days following the patch.
> 
> Cheers
> Mindstar

so whats the bug that needed fixing

I cant play!
0001: Failed loading mod/win/ClientWindow.dat due to invalid dependencies: lib.external.test.flex.4.runners.flexunit-uilistener-4.
HELP 0001: Failed loading mod/win/ClientWindow.dat due to invalid dependencies: lib.external.test.flex.4.runners.flexunit-uilistener-****
Help FATAL ERROR 0001
I get the Network Warning after patching when I try to join an ARAM game, anyone else?
I get unspecified error please help
At what point are you getting the error?  Patching? Logging in? Loading into game?
During the patching phase, everything is downloaded and when it says "Applying patches" it gives me unspecified error
OK - first step work through the solutions in the [patching issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) support page and let me know how you go.
tried deleting all the stuff that I was told but still doesn't work, still getting Unspecified Error Check Logs For More Information

Next step then will be to [submit a support request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and one of the Player Support team will be able to work with you to get to the source of the problem.

Cheers
Mindstar
So i restarted my computer and a pop up saying "League of legends path has not been set. please browse to your league of legends directory." what do i do?
There's a bug with the in-game scoreboard. When you hit tab/o, the text appears before the backdrop. I assume this happened because it now fades in, but someone forgot to make the text also fade in.
Can someone help me please. Im getting a unspecified error
